Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2879 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-2879 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.4-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package skopeo is earlier than 1.14.4-1, affected by CVE-2022-2879
